content: The simplest way is to install Compact Headers. The picture shows the header in single-line mode. Other customizations are possible with Message Header Toolbar Customize or even more (advanced) with userChrome.css.
creator: sfhowes

content: What is the hardware acceleration setting in Settings/General? If it's enabled, disable it, restart TB, test scrolling.
creator: sfhowes

content: Timeouts are often cause by incompatible antivirus. Try sending with AV removed (if it's not Windows/MS Security) or with Windows running in safe mode.
creator: sfhowes

content: The setting has to made in your browser's settings. See the picture for the Firefox example.

content:
jshrek said
Prior to v115 I was able to add the NOT JUNK button to the Customize Toolbar. It would be hidden until I went to the Junk folder, and then it would appear. However in v115, there is only the JUNK button under Customize Toolbar options, but no NOT JUNK button. Is this a bug, or was it removed on purpose?

FYI ... I am using v115.4.2 (64-bit) on Windows.
creator: jeff18
